FIELD.name: ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Publisher data set id; this is an identifier for the dataset in question and can be used to retrieve the data.

FIELD.name: access_url
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: URL to retrieve the data or access the service.

FIELD.name: service_def
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifier for the type of service if accessURL refers to a service.

FIELD.name: error_message
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: If accessURL is empty, this column gives the reason why.

FIELD.name: semantics
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: What kind of data is linked here? Standard identifiers here include science, calibration, preview, info, auxiliary

FIELD.name: content_type
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Media type for the data returned.

FIELD.name: content_length
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Size of the resource at access_url
